roleset.name: meeting, coming together

role.descr: explicit agent, entity hosting/causing arg1 to meet (rare)
body coming together (includes mention of the meeting itself)

example.name: arg1
example.text: These conclusions provided the impetus for the Officeâ€™s development of a background report, and for the convention of a meeting of experts that took place in February 2013.

example.name: arg1
example.text: It looks like there is a significant possibility that no candidate will come to the GOP convention with enough delegates to win a first vote .

example.name: both args
example.text: The King's greatest contribution to Buddhism was his convention of the Fourth Council.
